amendment.description: Amendment ensures that no permit for the construction, operation, or maintenance of an export facility can be denied until all reviews required under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 are complete.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 114-359 to ensure that no permit for the construction, operation, or maintenance of an export facility can be denied until all reviews required under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 are complete.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. McKinley.
